about_the_game:
The full soundtrack to Underway composed by Matt McGreevy! Not many tracks, not super detailed, but they sound great and they fit well. All in a nice package for your ears to enjoy.

(But it might be better if you've played the game first)

Tracks:
01 - "A New Beginning"
02 - "Feeling Dread"
03 - "Probe Your Mind"
04 - "Bane Of Existence"
05 - "A New Path"
06 - "There's Blood On Your Hands."
07 - "POWERSHOW"
08 - "Returning The Favor"
09 - "Make An Impact."
10 - "Quiet Remorse"
11 - "Enter The Darkness" (Bonus)
12 - "Leo's Requiem" (Bonus)
13 - "Melody Of Disaster" (Bonus)

(Album art by Joaqui Norris)
